title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 Points

  • 1 - for equating MR = MC or P = MC

  • 1 - for MC curve above AVC curve (or shut down price)
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • 1 - for equating MR = MC or P = MC

  • 1 - for MC curve above AVC curve (or shut down price)

The student earns one of the following points:

  • 1 - for equating MR = MC or P = MC

  • 1 - for MC curve above AVC curve (or shut down price)

The student earns all of the following points:

  • 1 - for equating MR = MC or P = MC

  • 1 - for MC curve above AVC curve (or shut down price)

title: Part B
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

1 - for winner takes all.

The student earns all of the following points:

1 - for winner takes all.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
2 Points

  • 1 - for observe that with a negative externality MSC>MPC. Thus, there is a need to regulate (e.g., per unit taxt) to make marginal private cost equal marginal social cost so as to achieve the equality to MSB and MSC.

OR

  • 1 - for equate the MB of reducing pollution to the MC of reducing pollution.
